thread.title: Ground News - This Gaza bakery is making cakes for Palestinians trying celebrate life amid war
thread.title_full: Ground News - This Gaza bakery is making cakes for Palestinians trying celebrate life amid war

author: npr
title: Ground News - This Gaza bakery is making cakes for Palestinians trying celebrate life amid war
text: A professional bakery in Gaza has reopened, using solar panels for refrigeration and flour from the black market, to meet the demand of displaced Palestinians seeking cakes to celebrate life amid war. [Noticias ao Minuto 4 hours agoÂ·PortugalRead Full Article] Hamas contabiliza 30.960 mortes desde inÃ­cio da guerra In the last 24 hours, 82 people died, indicated the ministry in a statement, adding that 72,524 people were injured since the start of the war, on October 7. The Gaza Strip war was triggered on October 7 last year by an unprecedented attack carried out by Hamas fighters - in power since 2007 in that Palestinian enclave - who infiltrated southern Israel, causing 1,163 deaths, the majority civilians, according to the latest balance from Israeli auâ€¦ [telesurtv.net 5 hours agoRead Full Article] Number of Palestinians killed by Israeli aggression on Gaza reaches almost 31,000 The Gaza Health Ministry announced this Saturday that the number of Palestinians killed since October 7 has increased to 30,960 and those injured to 72,524. ALSO READ: EU announces opening of humanitarian maritime corridor to Gaza The Israeli occupying forces committed 10 massacres in the last day, killing 82 Palestinians and injuring 122 others, the ministry said.
